General.Name: China Satellite Communications Co Ltd
General.Description: China Satellite Communications Co., Ltd. provides satellite communications and broadcasting services to broadcast, telecom, corporate, and government customers. It offers satellite resource leasing services, such as long-term and occasional use; value-added services, including consulting, training, network access test and antenna certification, and interference location services, as well as tracking, telemetry, and control services; and bandwidth rental services for TV channels distribution, contribution, and direct to home broadcast through satellites. The company also provides equipment supply and system integration, uplink service, HUB hosting and operation, and other teleport services; information services comprising remote sensing images, location information, and weather information services; internet access, voip, telemedicine, and other services; and integration internet information, emergency communications, private network communication network, E-education, IoT, and telecommunication services. In addition, it offers telecommunication services that include telecommunication backhaul, terrestrial network, backup, and emergency response support to mobile base stations; streaming media, audio and video transmission, and live broadcasting services; smart monitoring and early warning services; business and general aviation network connection, voice, image, air traffic, and operational data services; and cabin services. Further, the company provides integrated satellite broadband communication services, including enterprise network, internet connection, ICT, and audio and video transmission services. It operates various geostationary communications and broadcasting satellites covering China, Australia, Southeast Asia, South Asia, the Middle East, Europe, Africa, etc. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in Beijing, China. China Satellite Communications Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of China Aerospace Science and Technology Corporation.
